ToorCon 2003 Notes

I’ll write more about the con when I’m home tomorrow, but now that I’ve got mad net connectivity here at Dachb0den it seems a good time to share the collaborative notes on the conference that I and several other Rendezvous-enabled attendees took. So right here, exclusive, and in plain old readable ASCII, are:

  • Day One
  • Day Two

We got quite a few of the talks and took some pretty damn good notes. Read, learn, wish you had been there. Sucka.

—Sep 29, 2003
